title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. This issue affects all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash repeatedly.
EB: The expected behavior is that the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash when resizing the window vertically.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
